high_descs: Turn left and go straight towards the wall. Then, hang left and walk straight into the room and turn to the desk on your right.
Pick up watch from the desk.
Turn around and head straight, then proceed to turn left towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a watch by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs:
Turn around turn right go straight to the desk
Pick the watch from the desk.
Turn around  go straight walk near to the desk lamp
turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a watch by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Take the watch from the desk
Turn left to the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a watch by the light of a lamp
